name: DevMode, Inc.
description: DevMode specializes in mobile application and web development.  We especially like connecting mobile platforms to other devices through the latest wireless technologies.  Many of our clients rely on us to build enterprise mobility solutions.  We have the resources and expertise to build any project ranging from small projects to larger scale backend and platform buildouts and beyond!  Located in the North Loop of Minneapolis, we welcome anyone to visit and share your ideas with us.
